posts.postText:
New Traitor weapons basically.

Updated Disguiser: Takes a dead unconfirmed (confirmed if no unconfirmed bodies) body, you steal their name and walk around, if anyone aims at you, that name pops up.

Body Bomb: Plant it on a DEAD body, once inspected, it blows up. takes time to attach, but you choose that :D
Your body bomb sounds awesome, but it would be cooler if they had time to Scream after they identify it, maybe 2 seconds?

Oh yeah speaking of ttt suggestions, is there a way you guys can add new things to the end-of-round notice (innocent/traitors win) awards?

like you know how it says
you knifed someone over internet and such

we should add one relating to nnjg or one of the staff lol
